Package camzup.core

Class Color.LerpLrgba

java.lang.Object
camzup.core.Color.AbstrEasing
camzup.core.Color.LerpLrgba
All Implemented Interfaces:
Utils.EasingFuncObj<Color>, Utils.QuadFunction<Color,​Color,​java.lang.Float,​Color,​Color>
Enclosing class:
Color
public static class Color.LerpLrgba
extends Color.AbstrEasing
Converts two colors from standard RGB to linear RGB, uses linear interpolation, then converts back to standard RGB. Uses a gamma adjustment of 2.4.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static double COEFF_L_TO_S
    Amount by which the power of a color channel is multiplied when converting from linear to standard RGB; approximately 1.055 .
    static double COEFF_LB_L_TO_S
    Amount by which a color channel beneath the lower bound is multiplied when converting from linear to standard RGB; approximately 12.92 .
    static double COEFF_LB_S_TO_L
    Amount by which a color channel beneath the lower bound is multiplied when converting from standard to linear RGB; approximately 0.07739938080495357 .
    static double COEFF_S_TO_L
    Amount by which the power of a color channel is multiplied when converting from standard to linear RGB; approximately 0.9478672985781991 .
    static double EXPONENT_L_TO_S
    Exponent by which a channel is raised when converting from linear to standard RGB, 0.4166666666666667.
    static double EXPONENT_S_TO_L
    Exponent by which a channel is raised when converting from standard to linear RGB, 2.4.
    static double LB_L_TO_S
    When converting from linear to standard RGB, lower bound beneath which a color channel is not raised to a power, but rather is divided by a constant.
    static double LB_S_TO_L
    When converting from standard to linear RGB, lower bound beneath which a color channel is not raised to a power, but rather is divided by a constant.
